artist: Artist: Caleb Brown , et al.; Publisher: Fleabites, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical reproduction of watercolor illustration of a rabbit painting its toenails, and some other beast, with text, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 56 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Bestiary
